Brave New Obvious

  • About me

Hi, I am V. I am Head Nerd (CTO) and co-founder at Meiro, based in Brno, Czech Republic. I started Brave New Obvious as a way to document all the small victories and big facepalms I experience each day building a data product. Read more about me. You can find me on Twitter and Facebook.
